author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Fix tools/setup.py, was not respecting install prefix.
- Was installing into absolute /usr directories, changed to install relative to prefix.
- Was installing to non-standard "/usr/shared" directory, changed to Unix standard "<prefix>/share"

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Fix use of runpy.run_path for python < 2.7.

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Clean up system_test.dir properly before running tests.
- Fix issues with creating incorrect sub-directories if setUpClass fails.
